snippet.title: CrimeTrip - Official Trailer - Your partner in True Crime
snippet.description:
CrimeTrip is a true crime AR adventure game from Prologue XR Indy studio. 

Take on the role of a True Crime fan in charge of investigating 6 mind-blowing true crimes, from the heist of the century to TV bombs, mafia vendetta, drug smuggling, gangster assassination, and even a fake currency exchange office run by the feds.

Discover unresolved true-crime cold-case in crime scenes and a police station that only becomes more and more surreal as the story progresses. 

Use an array of investigative tools to elaborate your theories on unresolved true-crime cold cases and share them with fellow crime crazies. 

But beware of what you may find... Maybe this is not a game, but rather a gateway into a real-life rabbit hole.

If you like true crime then pre-register to CrimeTrip Beta and discover how we created an AR game after 18 months of development:

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Prologue.CrimeTrip
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/ca/app/crimetrip/id1613603569


GAME FEATURES

- Each CrimeTrip is focused on one historical true crime (70's 80's era).
- Solve ingenious and challenging puzzles with unique AR mechanics.
- Discover captivating, carefully crafted, true-crime content linked to a unique investigation board.
- Elaborate your theories on unresolved true-crime cold cases and share them with fellow crime crazies.
- Walk in an atmospheric police station connecting with surreal set-ups.
- Progress with an iterative hint system.
- Listen to a curated true-crime playlist.

http://www.crimetrip.com/
https://www.reddit.com/r/CrimeTrip/
(c) CrimeTrip is Developed & Published with love by our Indy game studio in Montreal: https://www.prologuexr.com/

This project would not have been possible without the trust and financial participation of the Canadian Media Fund and Sodec Québec.

------

We want to send our respect to all the true crime community and creators that we have been following with keen interest to develop our indy game. 

​@VictoriaCharlton     @makingatruecrimerer    @TrueCrimeCam    @mytruecrimenews   @TrueCrimeCentral    @TrueCrimeRecaps    @dinhlamgamedoithuong    @TrueCrimeMysteries    @RealCrime    @livvontheedge    @karipaolaa    @BriefCaseOfficial   @EleanorNeale    @dustindailey    @RachelShannon    @FilmRiseTrueCrime    @TrueCrimeRecaps    @TrueCrimewithMeghan    @MeganTrueCrime    @DanielleKirsty11    @TrueCrimeStoriesDocs    @UnmaskedTrueCrime    @GrizzlyTrueCrime   @OxygenTV    @BuzzFeedUnsolvedNetwork    @TrueCrimeMagazine    @georgiamarie_    @InsideTrueCrime    @CrimeBeatTV    @TyNotts    @KendallRae    @MrsTrueCrime     @verifiedtruecrimedaniel    @TheFellasMysteries    @TrueCrimeCanadaTV    @JCS    @unseentruecrime    @BuzzFeedUnsolvedNetwork    @morbidatruecrimepodcast1864    @truecrimegarage   @GRAZYTV   @CoffeehouseCrime   @sherrilyndaleofficial   @TheCasualCriminalist    @StephanieHarlowe    @CrimeTalk    @ExploreWithUs    @MadilynBailey    @coldcasedetective   @heavycasefiles    @bellafiori   @LawAndCrime  ​@Netflix @FilmRiseTrueCrime
